metadata.name: Pandemic
metadata.description:
It took me months to come up with this song. I started at the beginning of the pandemic and could not finish it. Over the years, I have come back from time to time and continued to work.

This song is about:
How our lives were turned upside down in a moment.
How we wanted to escape.
How fragile we are.
How we lost our loved ones.
How we couldn't breathe and talk.
How we didn't want to see what happened.
How we are haunted in our neighborhood.
How did we go crazy.
How our world became a boring empty place.
How did we end up alone.
